tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE footage_archive (
    footage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_id INT REFERENCES security_cameras(camera_id),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    length INT,
    resolution VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Footage (
  footage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  camera_id INT,
  time_recorded TIMESTAMP,
  footage_data BYTEA,
  FOREIGN KEY (camera_id) REFERENCES Camera(camera_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SurveillanceEvent (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  camera_id INT,
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  event_description TEXT,
  event_time TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (camera_id) REFERENCES Camera(camera_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PlaybackHistory (
  playback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  footage_id INT,
  playback_time TIMESTAMP,
  playback_user VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (footage_id) REFERENCES Footage(footage_id)
);

CREATE TABLE footage (
  footage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  camera_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  duration INT,
  file_path TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  camera_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  event_type TEXT,
  description TEXT
);
